title: "Exit" means a passage channel or means of egress from any building, storey or floor area to a stree
clause_text: "Exit" means a passage channel or means of egress from any building, storey or floor area to a street or other open space of safety; horizontal, outside and vertical exits having meanings at (i), (ii) and

source_pdf.text_snippet: "Exit" means a passage channel or means of egress from any building, storey or floor area to a street or other open space of safety; horizontal, outside and vertical exits having meanings at (i), (ii)
